title: Is Japanese music “cuter” than Korean music? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the Japanese music that you listen are merely these:  Berry Go! by Freezer feat. Kiichigo  1 Meter by Shimamo  Hello Morning by Kizuna Ai  PONPONPON by Kyary Pamyu Pamyu  Cirno's Perfect Math Class by IOSYS Of course you think that Japanese music are cuter, because it's just cutesy music that you listened to. But there are lots of Japanese music that decidedly not cute:  Separated Emotion by Eternal Melody  Nazokake Alice by Mitsuki Nakae  Hi no Ao by Sennzai  RESISTER by ASCA  Nevereverland by Nano  24–25 by Iri Go and listen more Japanese music. You'll soon found that they aren't as cute what the stereotype suggest.
